SELECT DISTINCT O.ORDERNO, G.G_PHONE, G.G_NAME, G.G_ADDRNO, G.G_ADDR1, G.G_ADDR2, U_NAME, U_PHONE, P.PRODUCTNO, P_CONTENT, P_PRICE, P_NAME, PI.SRCIMGNO, PI.IMGSRC, PI.IMGNAME, PI.ORGNAME, PI.IMGTYPE, O_CDATETIME, O_CNT, O_ADDRNO, O_ADDR1, O_ADDR2, O_PHONE, O_MESSAGE, O_PURCHASE, PRICE, C.NAME FROM mini_db2.T1_ORDER O LEFT JOIN mini_db2.T1_GUEST G ON G.G_PHONE = O.G_PHONE LEFT OUTER JOIN mini_db2.T1_USER U ON U.USERID = G.USERID LEFT JOIN mini_db2.T1_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCTNO = O.PRODUCTNO LEFT JOIN mini_db2.T1_PDIMAGE PI ON PI.PRODUCTNO = P.PRODUCTNO LEFT JOIN mini_db2.T1_CODE C ON C.CODE = O_PURCHASE AND C.KIND = 'PAYMENT' WHERE (O.G_PHONE IS NULL OR G.G_PHONE IS NOT NULL) AND (O.USERID IS NULL OR U.USERID IS NOT NULL) AND G.USERID = #{userId}
AND P_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pName}, '%')
ORDER BY PRICE
ORDER BY O_CDATETIME DESC
LIMIT #{startNum}, 6

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM mini_db2.T1_ORDER O LEFT JOIN mini_db2.T1_GUEST G ON G.G_PHONE = O.G_PHONE LEFT OUTER JOIN mini_db2.T1_DELIVERY D ON D.DELIVERYNO = O.DELIVERYNO LEFT OUTER JOIN mini_db2.T1_USER U ON U.USERID = G.USERID INNER JOIN mini_db2.T1_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCTNO = O.PRODUCTNO LEFT JOIN mini_db2.T1_PDIMAGE PI ON PI.PRODUCTNO = P.PRODUCTNO LEFT JOIN mini_db2.T1_CODE C ON C.CODE = O_PURCHASE AND C.KIND = 'PAYMENT' LEFT JOIN mini_db2.T1_CODE C2 ON C2.CODE = D_STATUS AND C2.KIND = 'SHIPPING' WHERE (O.G_PHONE IS NULL OR G.G_PHONE IS NOT NULL) AND (O.USERID IS NULL OR U.USERID IS NOT NULL) AND G.USERID = #{userId}

SELECT P.PRODUCTNO, P.P_NAME, P.P_PRICE, P.P_CONTENT, PI.IMGSRC FROM mini_db2.T1_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN mini_db2.T1_PDIMAGE PI ON PI.PRODUCTNO = P.PRODUCTNO WHERE P_KIND = 'R' AND P.P_NAME NOT LIKE '%카드%'
AND P.P_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY P_PRICE
ORDER BY P_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY P_CDATETIME
LIMIT #{startNum}, 9
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM mini_db2.T1_PRODUCT P WHERE P_KIND = 'R' AND P.P_NAME NOT LIKE '%카드%'

SELECT DISTINCT P.PRODUCTNO, P.P_PRICE, P_PRICE, P_NAME, P_CONTENT, P_CDATETIME, PI.SRCIMGNO, PI.IMGSRC, PI.IMGNAME, PI.ORGNAME, PI.IMGTYPE FROM mini_db2.T1_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN mini_db2.T1_PDIMAGE PI ON PI.PRODUCTNO = P.PRODUCTNO WHERE P.PRODUCTNO = #{productNo}
